heroSection.subtitle: Fast, customized, and scalable web services for your business.<newline></newline>We empower businesses through <secondaryHighlight>Technological Innovation</secondaryHighlight>. From software development to IT consulting, SEO, and graphic design — we deliver solutions that grow your business.
typewriters: From Monday to Sunday. We’re here for you.
Specialized in Full Stack software development. We bring your vision to life.
We handle everything: design, frontend, backend, databases, hosting & deployment.
Want to sell your products online but don’t know how to launch an eCommerce platform? Let us handle it.
Can’t keep up with IT trends and struggling to make the right decisions? We can help.
Want to launch a presentation site? Give us 7 days and it will be ready.
Few visitors? Your site could benefit from professional SEO optimization.
Need help creating a logo? Send us a message.
Let’s design your first business card. What do you say?
We design flyers, posters, brochures, and catalogs within 12 hours.
Don’t know how to plan, develop, or launch your app? We have some suggestions.

welcomeSection.title: Welcome to <primaryHighlight>Imboxsoft</primaryHighlight>
welcomeSection.subtitle: Your trusted technology partner
aboutUs: We are a team of passionate developers and designers offering complete web solutions, consulting, and graphic design services.
We’re excited to create custom applications, presentation websites, online stores, SEO, email marketing, and graphic design (business cards, catalogs, logos, etc.).
Whether you’re just starting out or need to scale, we provide full, transparent, and reliable support. Browse our <servicesLink>Services page</servicesLink> to discover how we can help.

whyUsSection.title: Why work with us?
whyUsSection.description-1: We deliver high-quality digital experiences — without unnecessary complications.<newline></newline>Work with us and we’ll accelerate your critical development and launch processes, eliminating repetitive effort.
whyUsSection.description-2: Our experience comes from a wide range of projects and skills honed over the years. We built our business on these foundations, and now we put them to work for you. This way, you’ll benefit from:

bulletPoints.title: Years of experience in IT and software.
bulletPoints.description: We’ve delivered projects across various industries, from startups to established companies. We know what works and what to avoid.

bulletPoints.title: Full-stack expertise: design & branding - coding - deployment.
bulletPoints.description: We cover the entire process: from idea, visual identity, and development to launch and maintenance.

bulletPoints.title: Extensive career in graphic design.
bulletPoints.description: Creativity is key. For over 10 years, we’ve delivered original designs tailored to your brand, focused on clarity and visual impact.

bulletPoints.title: We stay up to date with the latest IT trends.
bulletPoints.description: We use modern technologies and constantly follow industry updates.

bulletPoints.title: Results-oriented approach with innovative solutions.
bulletPoints.description: We don’t just deliver code — we deliver value. Optimized for performance, SEO, speed, and scalability.

bulletPoints.title: We’re available Monday to Sunday.
bulletPoints.description: We adapt to your schedule and respond quickly. You always have a direct point of contact with us.

bulletPoints.title: Best prices, tailored to your business needs.
bulletPoints.description: You don’t pay for what you don’t use. Our projects are transparent, with no hidden costs.

ourExpertiseSection.title: Our Expertise
ourExpertiseSection.subtitle: Complete IT services tailored to your business
ourExpertiseSection.description: Imboxsoft specializes in a wide range of technologies and systems, enabling us to stay at the forefront of innovation and respond to our clients’ ever-evolving needs.

ctaSection.title: Let’s find the best solution together
ctaSection.description: Send us a message with your idea and we’ll get back with a proposal as soon as possible.

faq.q: How can I request a personalized quote?
faq.a: You can reply directly to this email or contact us at [phone number] for a quote tailored to your project.

faq.q: What types of work or products do you offer?
faq.a: We offer [briefly list products/services], adapted for both large projects and one-off tasks.

faq.q: What is the service coverage area?
faq.a: We deliver and work nationwide, and for complex projects we can arrange on-site visits.

faq.q: Do you offer discounts for large quantities?
faq.a: Yes, we provide special discounts for volume orders or long-term contracts.

faq.q: How long does delivery or project completion take?
faq.a: Timelines vary depending on complexity, but in most cases, we deliver within [X] business days.

faq.q: How can I check the quality of the work?
faq.a: We can send examples from past projects and references from real clients.
